snippet.title: Diluvian Ultra Chapter One - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Diluvian Ultra Chapter One is coming on September 28, 2023! Become an immortal warrior-prince, pick up your blood-sword and paint the corridors of your tomb-ship red with the blood of your enemies, using an upgradeable arsenal of Tech weapons as well as grotesque, living Organic armaments and combine Armor and Lethal damage types to dispatch your foes!

Wishlist the game now!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1306970/Diluvian_Ultra/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/diluvian_ultra
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/diluvian-ultra-a5ad8c

Diluvian Ultra is a single-player, first-person shooter focusing on a retro aesthetic and fast-paced, strategic combat. The game is set in its own expansive fictive universe. Rather than gritty or dark, Diluvian Ultra is colorful and fantastical, like the cover of pulp sci-fi novels of the past.

Coming to Early Access in 2022!

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#retro  #FPS #DiluvianUltra
